item.title: Building a neural network with TensorFlow and Keras
item.description: A neural network in a classification problem aims to learn underlying patterns in a feature-set to make predictions based on provided training data.

item.title: Understanding PCA
item.description: Pricinpal component analysis (PCA) is often used as a means of exploratory analysis to uncover relatedness in a data set.

item.title: R Basics: piping in tidyverse
item.description: Working in R, oftentimes I find myself creating intermediate variables that serve no purpose other than to exist as a middle man.

item.title: Toolbox for frequently used UNIX commands
item.description: Surfing through directories: cd {directory_path} to set current directory, to journey through your file system, or cd ~ to go back home; cd .

item.title: Numbers Behind the Game: Canucks @ Habs (2/25/2020)
item.description: The Vancouver Canucks completed a comeback victory in Montreal with the final score of 4-3 in overtime.

item.title: About
item.description: About me I am a current graduate student at the University of Toronto, working on high-throughput RNA sequencing data.
